note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Defender
tagline: Defender  IRC Defender is a program designed for IRC networks, written in perl. It is highly a modular security service which amongst other things will keep virus and trojan drones from your network, allow you to set akills using regular expressions, and will prevent abuse of CGI:IRC proxies.
body:
IRC Defender - http://key2peace.github.com/defender
==================================================

Developed for irc.chatspike.net and the irc community

    Lead Developer:	Brain
    Contributors:	WhiteWolf, openglx, reed and others
    Module Developers:	ol, typobox43, Azhrarn
    Website Design:	Craig

If you like this software, please drop us an email at 
brain@chatspike.net so that we can get a rough idea of
how many users are using this program :-)

## Contact:
You may contact the authors of this software at #Defender on 
[irc.chatspike.net](irc://irc.chatspike.net/defender), or by the project page at http://key2peace.github.com/defender
